title: Plat adc streaming from low elo
body:
My new account is finally ready to go, and I'm going to attempt to stream the climb out of "hell".

http://www.twitch.tv/stormyslive

Please add the username StOrmysBIGSWORD so you may chat with me (on curse) and ask me anything related to helping you climb out. Will duo normals and etc, spectate games.

replies.body: got some time to do some 1 on 1s right now.

Streaming  now with commentary.

edit: so many problems with this game. 5 bugsplats and internet crashed several times. Had to play sivir going the more gold efficient route (static shiv first item), and used myself as bait to initiate bad teamfights on their end (since i was several levels behind, i wasnt focused on getting the kills, just baiting the enemy to do poorly).

Everychance i get had to farm, and i end the game 4/6/15, and had the same amount of gold as our 8/3/14 anivia. we won too, barely.

going to try and stream again later when everything isnt so buggy, Since i skipped to G3, everyone on the enemy roster was G2-Plat5, so i think i might skip again to G1 if i hit promos quickly.
Just skipped G5 to G3, and ranked is disabled, so I'll do any 1 on 1s if anyone like, just add me in game
Going to start in a bit. Will answer any questions etc via chat, maybe play a normals game or something.
Streaming now. Finally figured out whats wrong with the audio, so I will be talking and going over what I'm doing at all points of the game.

Streaming in a few minutes, no chat this time the GF is studying.

Did create a public chatroom called "Dance the night away"

curse link:http://cv.gg/Bd9w

starting in a few minutes

Starting in 15 min, heres the curse link for tonight:

http://cv.gg/o4B2


edit: ranked not available, i'll just be playing normals

About to start streaming, this is the curse link for today if you want to listen to me talk about what and why I do:

http://cv.gg/Qd6r

lol, yes beat up those bronzies. Yea! 
Kappa
even so you can't win every match. Just lost one to splitpushing.

Just played game 2, going for maybe 3 more games before I take a break.

my Lolking is here:

http://www.lolnexus.com/NA/search?name=stormysbigsword&region=NA
I see the video in a game atm
I think i got the audio fixed
About to start streaming, I placed silver4 even though i tried to reach bronze 5..
